programme.desc: New West Ham boss Julen Lopetegui gets a taste of Premier League football at the club on Saturday Night Football, as Aston Villa - now dining at Europe's top table - pay a visit. (17.08)

programme.desc: Off to the perfect start in pursuit of a fifth straight Premier League title, Manchester City challenge Julen Lopetegui's West Ham at the London Stadium on Saturday Night Football. (31.08)

programme.title: Premier League Summer Series

programme.title: Premier League Summer Series
programme.desc: The Magpies take a hard-fought opening-day win to the south coast, as Eddie Howe's side gear up for a Super Sunday encounter with Andoni Iraola's Bournemouth in the Premier League. (25.08)

programme.title: Premier League Summer Series

programme.title: Premier League Summer Series
programme.desc: Brighton and Crystal Palace rekindle their heated rivalry on Super Sunday. Fabian Hurzeler's men are without a win in three, while Oliver Glasner's Palace are unbeaten in four. (15.12)

programme.title: Premier League Summer Series
programme.desc: Having responded to a Villa-inflicted setback with a 3-0 win over Ipswich, Newcastle look to strengthen their push for Champions League football on Super Sunday at Brighton. (04.05)

programme.title: PGA Tour Originals
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy's toewijding aan zowel lichaam als geest is de bouwsteen geweest van zijn legendarische carrière. Hij is pas de zesde man die de carrière Grand Slam heeft voltooid. 'Rory: The Long Game' werpt een blik op de duurzaamheid en veerkracht die McIlroy de afgelopen twee decennia heeft getoond, terwijl hij is getransformeerd van een tienerfenomeen tot een van de legendes van de sport.

programme.title: Club TV Special
programme.desc: Met oud-doelman Theo Snelders duiken we bij hem thuis in de fotoboeken van zijn lange voetbalcarrière. Eind jaren '80 vertrok hij naar Schotland waar hij ook uitgroeide tot publiekslieveling.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Roy Makaay heeft een indrukwekkende internationale carrière achter de rug. Hij werd Europees topscorer, won prijzen met Bayern München, en groeide bij Deportivo La Coruña uit tot een legende. In Duitsland maakt hij nog altijd deel uit van de Bayern Legends, in Spanje wordt hij op handen gedragen. Maar in Nederland? Daar lijkt zijn naam vaak vergeten, of in elk geval minder gekoesterd.

programme.title: Ep. 11

programme.title: Bayer Leverkusen - Bayern Monaco

programme.title: Brighton - Arsenal

programme.desc: Jelena Ostapenko's near seven-year wait to vie for a WTA 1000 title ends in Doha, as the former Grand Slam champion faces 23-year-old American Amanda Anisimova in an unseeded final. (15.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Dubai
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in Dubai. Mirra Andreeva - the youngest-ever WTA finalist - and Denmark's Clara Tauson face off for glory. (22.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Iasi
programme.desc: Entering her first final since 2021, Jill Teichmann faces off against Irina-Camelia Begu in the Iasi final. (20.07)

programme.title: WTA Final: Prague
programme.desc: In an all-Czech showdown for the Prague Open title, it's the top seed and 2023 runner-up Linda Noskova against 2022 champion Marie Bouzková. (26.07)

programme.title: ATP Final: Kitzbuhel
programme.desc: Channelling his semi-final heartbreak into a run to the Kitzbuhel final, 22-year-old Frenchman Arthur Cazaux looks for revenge over Alexander Bublik and a first ATP Tour title. (26.07)

programme.title: ATP Final: Umag
programme.desc: Appearing in his second straight final, Luciano Darderi looks to add the Umag title to the one he won in Bastad last week as the Italian meets 27-year-old Spaniard Carlos Taberner. (26.07)

programme.title: Washington Semi-Final Highlights
programme.desc: Ending the run of hometown hero Frances Tiafoe, Ben Shelton advances to the Washington semi-finals as the Americans battles 12th seed Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. (26.07)

programme.title: Washington Semi-Final Highlights
programme.desc: Enjoying a stellar week in Washington, 22-year-old Brit Emma Raducanu targets the final of this WTA 500 event as the 2021 US Open champion faces Anna Kalinskaya. (26.07)

programme.title: Live: ATP Toronto & WTA Montreal
programme.desc: The first WTA 1000 event of the summer hard-court swing begins in Montreal as Marketa Vondrousova meets 20-year-old Alexandra Eala and home hope Marina Stakusic plays Jaqueline Cristian.

programme.title: Live: WTA Washington Final
programme.desc: British men's number three Jacob Fearnley launches his Toronto bid with an opening-round clash at the ATP Masters 1000 event. Fearnley suffered a first-round exit at Wimbledon last month.

programme.title: Live: ATP Washington Final
programme.desc: Into his second final of 2025, Australian world number 13 Alex de Minaur meets Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. De Minaur fell short in the Washington final back in 2018.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 3M Open at TPC Twin Cities on the PGA Tour. Venezuelan golfer Jhonattan Vegas claimed victory last season.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Aaron Wise
programme.desc: Former and current pros take viewers behind the ropes on the course, discussing such things as shot setup, club selection, and strategy. Here, Aaron Wise delivers the lesson.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Corey Conners
programme.desc: Former and current pros take viewers behind the ropes on the course, discussing topics such as shot setup, club selection, and strategy. Here, Corey Conners delivers the lesson.

programme.title: Women's Scottish Open 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 Women's Scottish Open, held at the renowned Dundonald Links in Ayrshire.

programme.title: Senior Open 2024 Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2024 Senior Open Championship, staged at Carnoustie in Scotland. Germany's Alex Cejka won last year's competition at Royal Porthcawl in Wales. (28.07)

programme.title: 3M Open 2019 Highlghts
programme.desc: The best of the action from the 3M Open on the PGA Tour from TPC Twin Cities in Blaine, Minnesota.

programme.title: Best of The OpenZone 2024
programme.desc: A look at the best moments from The Open Zone during 2024.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Jon Rahm
programme.desc: Spanish superstar Jon Rahm joins the Golf Academy to discuss his career and give some helpful tips on improving your game.

programme.title: Golf Academy: S Lyle Full Swing
programme.desc: Two-time Major champion and Hall of Famer Sandy Lyle gives you his tips for success on the course. This lesson is dedicated to achieving a perfect swing.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Mina Harigae
programme.desc: Former and current pros take viewers behind the ropes on the course, discussing such things as shot setup, club selection, and strategy. Here, Mina Harigae delivers the lesson.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Max Homa Part 1
programme.desc: Multiple-time PGA TOUR winner Max Homa joins Bones on the course, and shares the tips and strategies that have led to his global success. Part 1.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Nick Dougherty returns to share his expertise with an episode of Tee Time Tips, from the host venue of the 2023 BMW PGA Championship, Wentworth Club in Surrey.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Nick Dougherty returns to share his expertise with an episode of Tee Time Tips, from the host venue of the 2024 BMW PGA Championship, Wentworth Club in Surrey.

programme.title: Legends Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The Legends Tour season continued with the Reignwood Legends Championship, taking place at Reignwood Pine Valley in Beijing, China.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 3M Open at TPC Twin Cities on the PGA Tour. Venezuelan golfer Jhonattan Vegas claimed victory last season.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Lyle Short Game
programme.desc: Two-time Major champion and Hall of Famer Sandy Lyle gives you his tips for success on the course. This lesson is dedicated to improving your short game.

programme.desc: Two-time Major champion and Hall of Famer Sandy Lyle gives you his tips for success on the course. Here, Sandy explains the essential shots that every golfer needs to practice.
